msdp032t Zombie with a Plan
Rarity: Rare
Inventory options for this figure are controlled by the main/parent unit.
Zombie with a Plan
Zombie Captain America starts the game with the Disney+ #s002 Captain America's Shield equipped.
5 Points

June 1, 2022
Bobcat2022
Playing zombie's advocate, it's nice to have ESD on Charge figures because then when the Charge figure is locked in close it's harder for them to get sniped in the back from range. And I suppose having the shield does give Zombie Cap the ability to use regular ESD on his Regen clicks, when he no longer has it from his special power. So maybe that's a good use of five points, if you can spare it.
